metadata.title: CVE-2015-5206 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the HTTP/2 experimental feature in ApacheTraffic Server before 5.3.x before 5.3.2 has unknown impact and attackvectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-5168.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
